description:
Conan and his friends discover the dead body of producer Harawaki at the filming location of a zombie movie. On his smartphone is a video of Harawaki drinking hydrocyanic acid. Because only the dead Harawaki was able to drive and there is no cell phone service at the cottage, they are unable to call the police. That night, the bedridden Kogoro tells Ran and Kazuha that zombies have surrounded the cottage. The girls don`t believe him, but they are immediately attacked by zombies. Conan and Heiji fight off the zombies, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La villa encerclée par les zombies (2e partie)
ゾンビが囲む別荘 (中編)
